I had a really great time, thanks.

I love the group discussion time. Every member can share his or her opinions with others.

Love your energy and lectures. The Great Poetry Competition was such a fun idea! Students were really creative presenting their assigned poems. For the workload of the class, it'd be better if there is a little bit less group assignments.
老師人授課方式有趣、內容深，讓人收穫良多。

Corrigan provides very profound thoughts. However, more often they are too abstract, philosophical to be understood. I think professor can incorporate more history into the class so that we might better understand the texts.
